attributes.title: Hacked?
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I wanted to see the cruelty of the Antichrist’s plans in action. But to my surprise, the entire app was in Russian and when I attempted to change the language, the only other language available was Chinese. Worst app. Awful.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app felt a little racey. It’s platforms were based in hate. Also the app was unattractive to look at. I also the app lacks factual information. All in all I would say the people who developed the app are week and may not win the next election.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I wish I could give it a lower rating. It was a huge waste of my time getting the app and wish I never had gotten it. I hated all of it and was so happy to delete it. I would advise anyone who is thinking about getting the app to rethink their decision.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: The absolute worst thing that could ever happen to the app store. I downloaded it to support your (rich cis straight white males) president but it hacked my phone when I put in my phone number. It sent texts/called everyone including my  former boss (i am now fired from my job) DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! I AM FURIOUS!!!!

attributes.title: He stole my cats 😭😭🎃🤖🧞‍♀️🧚‍♂️🍑

attributes.title: Ya moms dad !
attributes.review: If I could give it 0 stars I would this app is so trash it basically agreeing to not having basic human rights the app started to um mess up I saw what look like to be an orange smiling cheese puff looking back at me I think people should realize this should be fixed immediately.

I was so excited to open the app! After hours of scrolling I encountered something so terrible and horrifying...... I was at a loss of words it was a huge orange monster it was saying it was going to  tear down my house I can’t believe that my presidents app would do such a thing.   DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS DANGEROUS!!!!

attributes.title: #SaveBarron
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app and it was absolutely trash. As soon as i saw that ugly orange thing on my screen, i was traumatized. i can’t believe this app even exists. please take this app off of this appstore. And also play for donald duck’s son Barron he doesn’t deserve to have him as a father. #SaveBarron

attributes.title: Crashes when opened
attributes.review: I tried opening this app several times. It kept black screening and crashing. Got past the initial load screen once, then it froze and crashed again. It’s unusable.
